fields.title: Custom Web Application Development
fields.tagline: Scalable, modern web apps built to power your business.
fields.overview: We design and build robust web applications tailored to your exact requirements — from internal dashboards and portals to customer-facing SaaS platforms. Our stack includes Django, React, and cloud-native architectures.
fields.meta_title: Custom Web App Development Kenya | Dravtech
fields.meta_description: Hire Dravtech for scalable web application development in Kenya.

fields.title: Mobile App Development
fields.tagline: Cross-platform mobile apps that your users will love.
fields.overview: We build high-performance Android and iOS applications using React Native and Flutter. From MVPs to enterprise-grade apps, our team handles the full lifecycle from concept to App Store deployment.
fields.meta_description: Professional Android and iOS mobile app development by Dravtech, Nairobi.

fields.title: Enterprise Systems & ERP Integration
fields.tagline: Unify your business operations with smart system integration.
fields.overview: We design and deploy enterprise resource planning systems, integrating inventory, finance, HR, and CRM into one unified platform. Custom-built or integrated with leading platforms like Odoo.
fields.meta_description: Custom ERP and enterprise system integration services by Dravtech Kenya.

fields.title: AI Automation & Intelligent Bots
fields.tagline: Automate the repetitive. Amplify the intelligent.
fields.overview: We build AI-powered automation workflows, chatbots, and decision-support tools using OpenAI, LangChain, and custom ML models. Reduce operational overhead and increase accuracy across your business processes.
fields.meta_description: AI-powered automation and chatbot services for businesses in Kenya and Africa.

fields.title: Data Analytics & Business Intelligence
fields.tagline: Turn your raw data into actionable insight.
fields.overview: We build interactive BI dashboards, data pipelines, and reporting tools that give decision-makers real-time visibility into their operations. Tools include Power BI, custom Django dashboards, and Python data stacks.
fields.meta_title: Data Analytics & BI Solutions Kenya | Dravtech
fields.meta_description: Business intelligence and data analytics consulting by Dravtech.

fields.title: Brand Identity & UI/UX Design
fields.tagline: Designs that communicate, convert, and captivate.
fields.overview: From logos and brand guidelines to complete UI/UX design for web and mobile products, our creative team delivers polished, functional visuals that reflect your brand's identity and engage your audience.
fields.meta_title: Brand Identity & UI/UX Design Kenya | Dravtech
fields.meta_description: Professional brand identity and digital design services from Dravtech.

fields.title: Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps
fields.tagline: Reliable, scalable cloud architecture for modern applications.
fields.overview: We architect, deploy, and manage cloud environments on AWS, GCP, and Azure. Our DevOps practice covers CI/CD pipelines, containerisation with Docker & Kubernetes, and infrastructure-as-code using Terraform.
fields.meta_description: Cloud infrastructure setup, DevOps consulting, and managed hosting by Dravtech.

fields.question: How long does a typical web app project take?
fields.answer: A simple web app typically takes 6–10 weeks. Complex platforms can take 3–6 months depending on scope.

fields.question: What technologies do you use?
fields.answer: Our primary stack is Django (Python) for the backend, React or Next.js for the frontend, and PostgreSQL for the database. We also work with REST and GraphQL APIs.

fields.question: Do you provide hosting?
fields.answer: Yes. We can deploy to AWS, GCP, or Azure and set up managed hosting with monitoring and backups.

fields.question: Can the AI bot be trained on our own data?
fields.answer: Yes. We use retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to ground the bot's answers in your company documents, knowledge base, or database.

fields.question: Which channels can the bot be deployed on?
fields.answer: WhatsApp, Telegram, web chat widget, Slack, and any REST API-compatible platform.

fields.question: Do you build for both Android and iOS?
fields.answer: Yes. We use React Native and Flutter to deliver a single codebase that runs natively on both platforms.

fields.question: Can you take over an existing app?
fields.answer: Absolutely. We do codebase audits and can maintain, refactor, or extend existing mobile apps.

fields.title: Soko360 – E-Commerce Platform for Kenyan SMEs
fields.summary: Built a multi-vendor e-commerce platform enabling 200+ small businesses to sell online with integrated M-Pesa payments, inventory management, and a mobile-responsive storefront.
fields.results: 200+ vendors onboarded in 3 months. Average vendor revenue up 35%. 98.7% payment success rate via M-Pesa Daraja integration.

fields.title: InsureBot – AI Claims Assistant for a Nairobi Insurer
fields.summary: Deployed a WhatsApp-based AI assistant that guides customers through the insurance claims process, collects documents, and provides real-time status updates.
fields.results: Claims processing time reduced by 60%. Customer satisfaction score improved from 3.2 to 4.7/5. Support team workload reduced by 40%.

fields.title: SafariTrack – Logistics Mobile App
fields.summary: Developed a cross-platform mobile app for a logistics company enabling real-time parcel tracking, driver management, and digital proof of delivery.
fields.results: Delivery confirmation time reduced from 48hr to 2hr. 3,000+ active drivers on platform. App rated 4.6/5 on Google Play.

fields.title: DataPulse – BI Dashboard for a Retail Chain
fields.summary: Built a real-time business intelligence dashboard consolidating sales, inventory, and staff data from 12 branches into one central platform.
fields.results: Branch managers save 8 hours/week on manual reporting. Stock-out incidents reduced by 25%. Executive team has daily live KPI visibility.

fields.title: Web App Development Consultation

fields.description: 60-minute session to design your AI automation roadmap and identify quick wins. Delivered with a written action plan.

fields.title: UI/UX Design Sprint
fields.description: Focused two-day design sprint producing wireframes and a clickable Figma prototype. Ideal for validating a product idea before full development.

fields.title: Cloud Infrastructure Audit
fields.description: Comprehensive review of your existing cloud or on-premise setup with a written report covering security gaps, cost optimisation, and architecture recommendations.

fields.title: Django SaaS Starter Kit
fields.description: Production-ready Django boilerplate with auth, subscriptions (Stripe + M-Pesa), multi-tenancy, and a React frontend. Includes full documentation and a 30-min onboarding call.

fields.title: React Admin Dashboard Template
fields.description: Fully responsive React + Tailwind admin dashboard with dark mode, recharts, data tables, and role-based UI components. Download includes source code and documentation.

fields.title: M-Pesa Daraja Integration Guide (PDF)
fields.description: Comprehensive 80-page PDF covering STK Push, B2C, C2B, and Reversal APIs with full Python/Django code examples and Postman collections included.

fields.title: AI Chatbot Python Starter (LangChain + RAG)
fields.description: Downloadable Python project for building a RAG-powered chatbot with LangChain, OpenAI, and ChromaDB. Includes WhatsApp-ready webhook and deployment guide.

fields.title: Django REST API Boilerplate
fields.description: A clean Django + DRF starter with JWT auth, throttling, filtering, pagination, Swagger docs, and Docker configuration. Get your API running in minutes.

fields.hero_headline: Building Africa's Digital Future, One Innovation at a Time
fields.hero_subtitle: We are a team of passionate technologists, designers, and strategists dedicated to transforming businesses across Kenya and Africa through cutting-edge digital solutions.
fields.mission_body: To empower African businesses with world-class digital solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and innovation. We believe in leveraging technology to solve real-world challenges and create opportunities for sustainable development across the continent.
fields.vision_body: To be Africa's leading technology partner, recognized for our innovative solutions, exceptional service, and commitment to digital transformation. We envision a future where every African business has access to the technology they need to compete globally.
fields.how_we_work_intro: Our approach is collaborative, transparent, and results-driven. We work closely with our clients to understand their unique challenges and deliver tailored solutions that exceed expectations.
fields.final_cta_subtext: Let's discuss how we can help you leverage technology to achieve your business goals. From concept to deployment, we're here to support your digital journey.

fields.title: DravTech Founded
fields.description: Started with a vision to transform African businesses through technology. Began with a small team of 3 passionate developers.

fields.title: First Major Client
fields.description: Secured our first enterprise client and delivered a comprehensive e-commerce solution that processed over 10,000 transactions in the first year.

fields.title: Team Expansion
fields.description: Grew our team to 15 members and expanded our service offerings to include AI solutions and cloud infrastructure services.

fields.title: Regional Expansion
fields.description: Expanded operations to serve clients across Kenya, Uganda, and Tanzania. Launched our flagship SaaS product for African SMEs.

fields.title: Innovation First
fields.description: We embrace cutting-edge technology and creative thinking to solve complex problems. Innovation is at the heart of everything we do.

fields.title: Client Success
fields.description: Our success is measured by our clients' success. We are committed to delivering solutions that drive real business value and growth.

fields.title: Integrity & Transparency
fields.description: We believe in honest communication, ethical practices, and complete transparency in all our business relationships.

fields.title: Continuous Learning
fields.description: Technology evolves rapidly, and so do we. We invest in continuous learning and development to stay at the forefront of innovation.
